DENOMINATOR_STABILITY_TAU.rationale: Used in the Certification of Failure (COF) denominator to ensure computational stability (prevent division by zero) when observed Risk (S-02) is negligible (IEEE 754 compliance helper).

MINIMUM_EFFICACY_SAFETY_MARGIN_EPSILON.rationale: Mandatory percentage margin required: Measured Efficacy (S-01) must strictly exceed adjusted Risk (S-02) by this margin. Failure results in immediate P-01 Finality Denial.
